name: Rallyween
description:
Fangcheskja the vampire has been out on a midnight picnic, but the clocks went back and the sun's coming up! But she has a nitro-ed, open top, winged muscle car to get home in so it'll all be fine... right?

  • Beat the sun back to the safety of your castle!
  • Upgrade your car!
  • Jump over stuff!
  • Nitro past stuff!
  • Skiiiiiiiiid!!!
  • Beat 8  levels of skeletons, pumpkins and things!

Controls:
Up Arrow to ACCELERATE
Left & Right to STEER
Down Arrow to BRAKE PFSHHH YEAH OK
Space to NITRO
Ctrl to JUMP

Additional keys:F
F to toggle FULLSCREEN
M to turn the MUSIC ON/OFF

In the menus it's arrow keys, and space to buy / repair.

Hints: Going offroad will damage you, so stay on the road! Repairs get more expensive the more you do, so if you want to upgrade, be careful!

Note:
This game is currently in development over the 2021 Halloween period.  The game will come off sale when I've done all I can to it, so download it now while it's CHEEP! :D

----------
r015 update:
Added several music tracks, sound, made skeletons explode, tightened a few bits here and there. This is mostly a sound & music update though; there's a LOT, and it feels really cool now!

--------

That's it for now! I'll be back soon, follow me here to get updates! Or follow me on twitter, where I lie about what I'm working on, when it'll be finished, and set all kinds of unrealistic expectations for everyone including myself. Let me know what you think, if you find some problems I'll probs be able to fix 'em! :D https://twitter.com/phantogast

Thanks for reading this far. Happy Halloween, and enjoy!
